title: Sony Vegas Pro 13.0 build 444 (64-bit) (patch KHG)
description:
1. Install the application as update for (vegaspro13.0.428) with admin rights.
(This application is for only 64 bit systems), after install don't open App


2. A. Run "vegas.pro.13.0.(64-bit)-patch.exe" in folder "Patch KHG" and
click on "Patch" button. (wait some time)

IMPORTANT..........for WHO DOWNLOADS vegaspro13.0.444 without the 
vegas.pro.13.0.(64-bit)-patch.exe

- Patch that's comes with vegaspro13.0.444 in some web sites or torrents 
which u can find, it's not working, I use it and didn't work for me....i used 
vegas.pro.13.0.(64-bit)-patch.exe and worked great.


4. Use your firewall to stop internet connection of application.
Don't update it. You may use it without firewall with your risk.

** IMPORTANT : Some security software may give warning. It is false
positive. Patch KHG was tested and it is clean
